pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, November 15, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a vaccination clinic where he will thank health care workers. He will be joined by Minister of Tourism and Associate Minister of Finance Randy Boissonnault and Mayor of Edmonton Amarjeet Sohi.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an early learning and child care announcement along with Premier of Alberta Jason Kenney, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Karina Gould, Alberta Minister of Children’s Services Rebecca Schulz, Minister of Tourism and Associate Minister of Finance Randy Boissonnault, and Member of Parliament for Calgary Skyview George Chahal.

YMCA Shirley Stollery Child Care
9541 104 Avenue Northwest

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7519
    Toll-free: 1-877-413-4814
    Pass code: 4892477#

Media appearance

8:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Connect Edmonton 101.7 FM.
